PersonalStatement.text: Phillip Garza, born on 1994-08-09, is a Female based in Elizabethfurt, Aruba. She is Divorced and holds Romanian nationality. Currently working at Daniel, Wilson and Bradley.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Livingston PLC from 2009 to 2019.
Senior HR Manager at Daniel, Wilson and Bradley, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from Glasgow Caledonian University
Master's in Engineering from Shoolini University of Biotechnology and Management Sciences

PersonalSkills.text: Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys photography.
